about.content: catatan-muslim.com is a blog website that discusses various aspects of Islamic knowledge (etiquette, jurisprudence, hadith, tafsir, and more). The writings are based on references from various sources. If there are any errors or shortcomings in the writing, please inform us so the author can make corrections. Hopefully, the articles on this blog can help readers and the author, in particular, so that religious knowledge always accompanies us in every step of our life until we all return to Allah Ta'ala.
